description: a(1) = 1, a(n)= number obtained by replacing each digit of a(n-1) by six times its value.
comments: a(n) contains all of a(n-1) as its least significant digits.
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 13 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org) and Asher Natan Auel (auela(AT)reed.edu), May 15 2001
